status.description: Validation is blocked
status.name: Validation Standby

fields.Action:
1-connect to the Wbeui 

2- upgrade the HGW from the Wbeui
fields.Expected Result:
1- Check that the webui page is displayed

2- During the upgrade process:

      - An alert screen is displayed on on the GUI to inform the customer.

      - Check that the device is rebooting into rescue firmware to download and flash the new firmware.

      - Internet connection lost for approximately 5 mins for LAN/WLAN clients.

3-The new firmware is correctly updated

fields.Action: After the upgrade from the previous RC to the current one, the services status and  old configuration should not be lost.
fields.Expected Result:
The following services need to checked:

	- Internet: Wan connextivity(PPP Credentials), internet browsing....

	- VoIP is UP (FXS Incoming & outgoing calls)

	- DLNA: DMS running and media files well announced.

	- IPTV service is OK. (streaming, Zapping...)

	- Wi-FI parameters and Connectivity should be OK.(Wi-Fi 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz)

	- Local WebUI: LAN/WLAN Accessiblity and it should be possible to configure the DUT.
	- Admin Password is kept as modified and well restored

	 

	All the migration parameters (from Advanced settings) are kept: DHCP modifications, Firewall level and rules, NAT, ...

fields.description:
The Goal is to upgrade the DUT from the previous RC to the current RC and Verify the following services:
	- WebUI
	- Internet
	- VoIP FXS (Incoming/Outgoing)
	- VoIP DECT/CatIQ (Incoming/Outgoing) (if available)
	- Wi-FI 2.4Ghz
	- Wi-Fi 5.0Ghz (if available)
	- IPTV
	- DLNA
	- Migration Parameters (NAT/Firewall/Wi-Fi/...)
	...

	The RCs builds to use can be found under Wiki: http://wiki.be.softathome.com/mediawiki/index.php/Which_versions_and_branches_are_used_for_which_configs

	If there are questions about what builds to use, request that information to Nelson.

[Precondition]

	Triple play Services available and Heavy Configuration on DUT
	Use the Template under:  https://confluence.rd.softathome.com/display/HGW/Validation-Upgrade-Reporting
fields.summary: [UPGRADE] Settings Persistency - Upgrade RC-1 to RC

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
